comment: I just want to give a special shout out to those taking time to leave reviews of my books at Amazon. It really helps, and the five minutes you take to share an impression helps keep my efforts afloat. Thus far, I'm proud to say the last effort inThe Coming Civil Waris getting five stars across the board.
amr:

It really helps, and the five minutes you take to share an impression helps keep my efforts afloat. Thus far, I'm proud to say the last effort inThe Coming Civil Waris getting five stars across the board.

      :snt1 (w / want-01
            :ARG0 (ii / i)
            :ARG1 (g / give-01
                  :ARG0 ii
                  :ARG1 (s / shout-out-03
                        :ARG0 ii
                        :ARG1 (p / person

                                    :purpose (l / leave-11
                                          :ARG0 p

                                                :ARG0 p
                                                :ARG1 (b / book
                                                      :poss ii)
                                                :location (c / company
                                                      :name (n / name
                                                            :op1 "Amazon"))))))
                        :ARG1-of (s2 / special-02))
                  :ARG2 p)
            :mod (j / just))
      :snt2 (a / and
            :op1 (h / help-01
                  :ARG0 (ii2 / it)
                  :ARG1-of (r2 / real-04))
            :op2 (h2 / help-01
                  :ARG0 t
                  :ARG0 (y / you)
                  :ARG1 (t3 / temporal-quantity
                        :quant 5
                        :unit (m2 / minute))
                  :purpose (s3 / share-01
                        :ARG0 y
                        :ARG1 (ii3 / impression-03
                              :ARG0 y)))
            :ARG1 (k / keep-01
                  :ARG1 (e / effort-01
                        :ARG0 ii)
                  :ARG2 (a2 / afloat)))
      :snt3 (p2 / pride-01
            :ARG0 (ii4 / i)
            :ARG2 (s4 / say-01
                  :ARG0 ii4
                  :ARG1 (g2 / get-01
                        :ARG0 (e2 / effort-01
                              :mod (l2 / last)
                              :topic (w2 / war
                                    :name n
                                    :op1 "Coming"
                                    :op2 "Civil"
                                    :op3 "War")))
                  :ARG1 (s5 / star
                        :quant 5)

comment: Your darkest fears for the future of this country will be realized. The only question is what you can do to mitigate the disaster for yourself and family. If nothing else, the author explains what is happening around you and, in a sense, how this multicultural disaster that our nation has become MUST end if we are to survive.

comment: Please do not use terms that are offensive to those with disabilities.

comment: Hey there, derogatory comments are not productive. Please refrain from using them and consider other peoples feelings when posting. Thanks
